operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of Flows configured on the given container
operation.statusCode: Operation successful
User not authorized to perform this operation
The containerName is not found
One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns a list of Flows configured on a Node in a given container
operation.parameter: Type of the node being programmed (Eg. 'OF')
operation.statusCode: Operation successful
User not authorized to perform this operation
The containerName or nodeId is not found
One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: Returns the flow configuration matching a human-readable name and nodeId on a given Container.
operation.parameter: Type of the node being programmed (Eg. 'OF')
Human-readable name for the configured flow (Eg. 'Flow1')
operation.statusCode: Operation successful
User not authorized to perform this operation
The containerName or NodeId or Configuration name is not found
One or more of Controller Services are unavailable

operation.name: PUT
operation.documentation: Add or Modify a flow configuration. If the flow exists already, it will replace the current flow.
operation.parameter: Name of the Static Flow configuration (Eg. 'Flow2')
Type of the node being programmed (Eg. 'OF')
operation.statusCode: Static Flow modified successfully
Flow Config processed successfully
Failed to create Static Flow entry due to invalid flow configuration
User not authorized to perform this operation
The Container Name or nodeId is not found
Cannot operate on Default Container when other Containers are active
Failed to create Static Flow entry due to Conflicting Name or configuration
Failed to create Static Flow entry. Failure Reason included in HTTP Error response
One or more of Controller services are unavailable

operation.name: DELETE
operation.parameter: Name of the Static Flow configuration (Eg. 'Flow1')
Type of the node being programmed (Eg. 'OF')

outValue.documentation:
Response as dictated by the HTTP Response code 

Example:

RequestURL:
http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/flowprogrammer/default/node/OF/00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01/staticFlow/flow1

operation.statusCode: Flow Config deleted successfully
User not authorized to perform this operation
The Container Name or Node-id or Flow Name passed is not found
Failed to delete Flow config due to invalid operation. Failure details included in HTTP Error response
Failed to delete Flow config. Failure Reason included in HTTP Error response
One or more of Controller service is unavailable

operation.name: POST
operation.parameter: Type of the node being programmed (Eg. 'OF')
Name of the Static Flow configuration (Eg. 'Flow1')

outValue.documentation:
Response as dictated by the HTTP Response code 

Example:

RequestURL:
http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/flowprogrammer/default/node/OF/00:00:00:00:00:00:00:01/staticFlow/flow1

operation.statusCode: Flow Config processed successfully
User not authorized to perform this operation
The Container Name or Node-id or Flow Name passed is not found
Failed to delete Flow config due to invalid operation. Failure details included in HTTP Error response
Failed to delete Flow config. Failure Reason included in HTTP Error response
One or more of Controller service is unavailable

group.name: FlowProgrammerNorthbound
group.documentation:
Flow Configuration Northbound API provides capabilities to program flows.

Authentication scheme : HTTP Basic
Authentication realm : opendaylight
Transport : HTTP and HTTPS

HTTPS Authentication is disabled by default.
